dcterms:creator: C. Chelba
T. Mikolov
M. Schuster
Q. Ge
T. Brants
P. Koehn
T. Robinson
dcterms:description: The Google Billion Word dataset is considered one of the largest language modeling datasets with almost one billion tokens and a vocabulary of over 800K words. In this dataset, words appearing less than 3 times are replaced with a special unknown symbol. The data is based on an English corpus of 30,301,028 sentences whose order has been shuffled.
dcterms:title: Google Billion Word dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Merity
C. Xiong
J. Bradbury
R. Socher
dcterms:description: WikiText-103 is a smaller dataset of over 100M tokens with a vocabulary of about 200K words. Different from the Google Billion Word dataset, the sentences are consecutive which allows models to condition on larger contexts rather than single sentences.
dcterms:title: WikiText-103
